name: places/ChIJL3c7uaD2wokRcgrTRyHL5fI
formattedAddress: 15 Magaw Pl, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 Magaw Pl, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: We could not be more happy with our decision to work with Alice for our July 2021 wedding on Peaks Island in Portland. She is so warm and made us feel comfortable right away, and she was incredibly organized and responsive throughout the planning process. We also genuinely enjoyed her company on the day, and that allowed us to be ourselves and interact naturally even though we were on camera. Her second shooter, Molly, is also wonderful and friendly, but we hardly saw her - she is a super skilled ninja! So many times we would be enjoying ourselves and totally immersed in the moment, and just barely notice her out of the corner our eye catching all of those special details without intruding at all. The edited product is a beautiful memory that brings us right back to the feeling of the day, and everyone who sees it can’t help tearing up! We only wish we had splurged on a few more hours. I’d encourage anyone to book this team, and to make as much room in your budget as possible to have them with you from beginning to end - it really is the part of the experience that can stay with you forever! Thank you a million times to Alice and Molly!

originalText.text: Alice and Trevor were the absolute icing on the cake for our wedding. From the beginning, Alice was an absolute pleasure to talk to, and responsive to any requests/ideas. We had a blast the day of the wedding filming, both Alice and Trevor were beyond respectful, fun and sweet. They helped us to stay within our budget, and form a package that worked well for us, and we had preview films literally the next day, and multiple others leading up to the actual wedding video. My husband and I have watched it about 100x already and would not have changed a thing. Thank you thank you thank you! I could not recommend them enough!
